name: Shot Wave
description:
This game was made for the Unreal Engine 4 Summer Jam. The theme for the jam was Well that scalated quickly.

The team: Red Steel Monsters

Sound: Patricio Maffud

Art: Hugo Miraballes, Nicolás Rivero, Juan Cecchetto

Programmer: Facundo Balboa

Features (spoiler alert):

  • Explosions
  • Many weapons upgrades
    • Pistol
    • Pistol level 2
    • Uzi
    • Uzi level 2
    • Shotgun
    • Missile Launcher
    • Missile Launcher Level 2
    • Flamethrower
    • Railgun
  • Many enemies (4)
  • Retro wave ambience
  • Unlimited waves of enemies and gameplay (until you die)
  • Survival

Hope you have fun!
